name: Electrolatch
description:
Stethoscope? I just do it by ear 🔒

Electrolatch is a Call and Response rhythm game about cracking a lock.

Keyboard Controls
  • [Spacebar] - Respond to the rhythm
  • [Q] [E] - Cycle through song selection
  • [Esc] - Pause / Open menu
